# QuickBot-Recipes

This directory contains GitHub configurations for the QuickBot-Recipes repository.

## Contents

### Pull Request Template
- [PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md](PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md) - Template for plugin submissions

### GitHub Actions Workflows
- [workflows/validate.yml](workflows/validate.yml) - CI/CD for formula validation

## Contributing

Please read the [Plugin Development Guide](../docs/PLUGIN_GUIDE.md) before submitting plugins.
